column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of the best Tapas restaurants I've ever been to. The food is awesome especially the dates wrapped bacon. it melts in your mouth and there is a combination between salty and sweet that is just extraordinary. I also drank the sangria. The sangria is really nice as it was not too strong and it was just the right companion for the food. In addition
column2: the paella was also quite good. I rarely like paella as sometimes it was tasteless
column3: but Ba-Ba-Reeba has a really good looking and tasty paella. The service was also really good and the server is really friendly. The price is also just right and it was not too expensive.
